extendedInfo.description: Immerse yourself in the Word of God with Live-Streaming Christian Radio. Christian Radio offers Christian music, Christian Teaching and Talk Stations, as well as On-Demand Ministry Programs so you can listen from home or on-the-go.Christian Radio Benefits:â¢ Listen to live Christian Radio - Christian Worship, Contemporary Christian, and Southern Gospel music. Enjoy the latest hits from todayâs biggest names in Christian music like...       â¢ Matthew West       â¢ Sidewalk Prophets       â¢ Building 429       â¢ And many more...â¢ Hear Christian teaching and talk stations in AM & FM including:       â¢ Faith Talk       â¢ KDAR The Christian Station       â¢ WAVA 105.1       â¢ And many more...â¢ Listen to life changing messages from Christian leaders like...       â¢ Dr. Tony Evans - The Alternative       â¢ Dr. James Dobson's Family Talk       â¢ Adrian Rogers - Love Worth Finding       â¢ And many more...â¢ On-Demand Ministries â¢Find Christian programs from all of your favorite teachers and pastors, as well as discover new teachings, with on-demand ministries.â¢ Favorites â¢Save your favorite Christian radio stations to easily access programs and music you want to hear.â¢ Christian Radio Near You â¢Find local Christian radio stations using the Geo-Location feature and listen to local Christian stations while at home, or away.Additional Features:â¢ Que Recently Playedâ¢ View Upcoming Programsâ¢ Ability to link to iTunes to purchase songsâ¢ Recommends based upon  stations or ministry currently playing.About Salem CommunicationsSalem Communications is a Christ-centered, for-profit corporation, dedicated to building up the Church, which is the Body of Christ.If you have any feature requests, suggestions or you simply need help, please email us: support@christianradio.comFollow us on Twitter @iLoveChristianMusic

reviews.title: Kill the Ads
reviews.comment: Great Program. But I don\'t fancy the Ads always getting in my way, and having to close them continously. Please consider releasing a Premium version of the App without the Ads. I\'ll be happy to pay for it! Thanks.
reviews.author: Ufuoma Arhagba

reviews.title: I like that I can choose different stations
reviews.comment: No other I\'ve tried gives me a ..sucks hearing the same sermon day after day. Get rid of the ministries tab or change up the messages for five star rating
reviews.author: P J Dondero

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I love it! Can\'t find Eddie Long but still love it
reviews.author: Nicolas Burson

reviews.title: Playback error
reviews.comment: Please help me. I can\'t play it. It always says \"Playback error\". I\'m here in the Philippines.
reviews.author: Justice Dignos

reviews.title: Great Apo
reviews.comment: I really like how I can listen to my local station when I travel.
reviews.author: David Bingham

reviews.comment: Love the app. Its a great resource.
reviews.author: Rodney Whitaker
